thread.title: Nick Menza Was Left Out Of Grammys' 'In Memoriam' Segment [News]
thread.title_full: Nick Menza Was Left Out Of Grammys' 'In Memoriam' Segment [News]

title: Nick Menza Was Left Out Of Grammys' 'In Memoriam' Segment [News]

organizations.name: nick menza was left out of grammys

text:
Nick Menza Was Left Out of Grammys' 'In Memoriam' Segment Late Megadeth drummer was nominated for seven Grammy Awards in the past. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 12 hours ago 0 
During the "In Memoriam" segment of this year's Grammy Awards, the organizers gave no mention to Nick Menza, late Megadeth drummer who was nominated for seven Grammys over the years. 
This is not the first time late metal musicians were snubbed by the Grammys. Some of the previous notable omissions from this segment include Slayer's Jeff Hanneman, Wayne Static of Static-X, Dave "Oderus Urungus" Brockie of GWAR, and classic Iron Maiden drummer Clive Burr. 
Some of the artists that did get recognized include Leonard Cohen, Keith Emerson, Greg Lake, Prince, George Michael, John Wetton, Merle Haggard, Scotty Moore, Butch Trucks, and more.
